description: Returns the tags for an OpenSearch Serverless resource. For more information, see Tagging Amazon OpenSearch Serverless collections.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. The resource must be active (not in the DELETING state), and must be owned by the account ID included in the request.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key to use in the tag.
